Txt_Talk_Ashalam_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210_01.Text: *: I 'eard that Ortega bloke<--->the 'ero<--->came 'ere once and then set off southward lookin' for some key.
*: But 'e weren't the sort to need a key to open a door. 'E'd've just bashed the thing in, eh?
*: 'Ard as nails, 'e was. I wanna be just like 'im when I grow up!

Txt_Talk_Ashalam_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0310_01.Text: *: Hm. Yours is a face I have not seen before, friend. I must tell you something of this place.
*: When buying from our merchants, do not show any signs of desiring the item in question.
*: Do so, and the price will soar. You have been warned.

Txt_Talk_Ashalam_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0410_01.Text: *: Just visitin', are ya? Well, this town is bleedin' marvellous! 'Specially at night, if ya know wot I mean! Waheyyy!

Txt_Talk_Ashalam_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0510_01.Text: *: Welcome to the town of Asham, wanderer<IfSolo(,s)>.

Txt_Talk_Ashalam_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0610_01.Text: *: Our town is famed for its most exotic and alluring belly dancing. You must enjoy some while you are visiting us.

Txt_Talk_Ashalam_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0620_01.Text: *: Those who know of such things say that coagulant can be used to confuse monsters. Intriguing...

Txt_Talk_Ashalam_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0710_01.Text: *: Good evening, fair maiden. Are the stars not beautiful tonight?
*: Oh me, oh my! Just look at you! What a handsome fellow you are! I wish to give you the priceless gift of puff-puff! Will you permit me?
*: Ahh, you are a serious, sober soul, I see. So be it. But if you should ever change your mind, I will be waiting. Hee hee!
*: Ohh, I am so happy to hear you say this!
*: Goodness me, but I cannot see to you all at once! Whatever do you think I am? Hee hee!
*: Just you, my sweet. You, and you alone! Come now, will you follow me to my private chamber?
*: You will not? Such a shame. But never mind. Goodbye for now, my sweet!
*: Come then, follow me! Hee hee!

Txt_Talk_Ashalam_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1110_01.Text: *: Ah, that shop? It is only open at night.
*: As it happens, a blade sold there has taken my fancy. Perhaps I will head to the inn and rest there till nightfall. I do not have any other pressing matters, after all...

Txt_Talk_Ashalam_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1210_01.Text: *: There are so many things I want to buy, but I am nowhere near rich enough for these prices. It might be time I learnt how to haggle...

Txt_Talk_Ashalam_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1310_01.Text: *: That small shop on the corner counts all kinds of curios amongst its wares.
*: However, the rarity of the goods there is matched only by the rarity of people who can actually afford them<--->the prices are ludicrous!
*: Frankly, I question if the merchant who runs the establishment has any conscience to speak of. Do not allow him to take advantage of you, now!

Txt_Talk_Ashalam_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1410_01.Text: *: On my travels, I recently learnt that there are certain weapons out there which are especially effective at wounding specific enemies.
*: Supposedly a weapon of that ilk can be found in the nation of Ibis. Alas, I have been unable to find any notable gear here in Asham.
*: It's looking like I will soon be Ibis-bound if I am to improve my chances in battle.

Txt_Talk_Ashalam_Out_SUB_0_VOLUME_0820_0.Text: Well, she's taken a real shine to you! Share all when you're done, okay?
Hmph! What you get up to in your own time is no concern of mine.
Sounds magical. Right, shall we get going?
I don't want to know. Come on, let's go, shall we?
{LEADER} quietly (and a little sheepishly) rejoins the party.

Txt_Talk_Ashalam_House01_2F_SUB_0_ACTOR_.Text: *: Don't you go givin' my girl any funny ideas, you 'ear? She's got enough of 'er own already! HUR HUR!
*: Now, just sit right here on the bed... That's it, my sweet...
*: It is alright with you if I turn off the light, yes?
*: Do not tease me so, my sweet! Hee hee!
*: Here we go, then! Hee hee!
What...? Uhh, what are you...? Heh!
*: Not bad, eh? I give a puff-puff an' an 'alf, I do! HUR HUR!
*: My sweet, meet my father! He is the greatest practitioner of the puff-puff in all the lands of the world!
*: That's me done, then. Don't be a stranger, eh, sunshine? HUR HUR!
*: So, my sweet, how are you feeling? Are you soothed and calmed? I do hope so! You will come and visit us again soon, yes?
*: So, my sweet, how are you feeling? Are you soothed and calmed? I do hope so! You will come and visit us again soon, yes?

Txt_Talk_Ashalam_House02_2F_SUB_0_ACTOR_.Text: *: Ah, greetings, traveller<IfSolo(,s)>! I myself am a traveller at heart. Long have I dreamt of visiting the countries of the mystic East...
*: Alas, the only way to get there is via a secret dwarven path.
*: And that infuriatingly tight-lipped little curmudgeon Nordy absolutely refuses to show me the way!
*: Perhaps if I had the ear of his friend, the king of Portoga, I might be able to convince him...
*: Clean, fresh water is the lifeblood of humankind.
*: Once one realises that, it is impossible not to gaze at it with wonder...

Eh!? My Morph spell failed?
Eek! Umm... Don't mind me!

Txt_Talk_Ashalam_House03_SUB_0_ACTOR_011.Text: *: Do you know all that there is to know of this part of the world, friend?
*: Do not attempt to discourage me with this most unlikely claim. I have something to tell you.
*: The kingdom of Ibis lies in the desert to the south-west of here. This knowledge will be of great use to you, I am sure.

Txt_Talk_Ashalam_Shop02_SUB_0_ACTOR_0310.Text: *: Once the desert comes into view, head south and follow the line of the mountains. You will reach a shrine in the centre of a foul marsh.
*: The old man there knows something of that most valuable of items, the magic key.

Txt_Talk_Ashalam_Theater_SUB_0_ACTOR_051.Text: A thousand apologies, but the theatre does not open until evening, friend.
Please, you must not make a nuisance of yourself. Leave the ladies to their practice.

Now, girls<--->shake those hips!
And a one! <WAIT>[0.25]And a two! <WAIT>[0.25]
And a one! <WAIT>[0.25]And a two!

Txt_Talk_Ashalam_Theater_SUB_0_ACTOR_052.Text: I am the manager of this humble establishment. He who wished to travel to the East, but could not.
Do you have some business with me, friend?
Hm? You say you have met with Lena, who once danced here with us?
Praise be to the highest! We have all been so worried about her! Where is she? You must tell me!
But no. She is her own person. She must be allowed to return only when she wishes.
We are simply glad to know that she is safe and well!
You must be rewarded for bringing to us such very good news. Here, friend<--->for you.
I once harboured ambitions of establishing a theatre in the lands of the East.
Ahh, it all seems like a distant dream to me now...

Txt_Talk_Ashalam_Theater_SUB_0_ACTOR_011.Text:
*: Haa... Haa...
But sister...I can barely move...

Txt_Talk_Ashalam_Theater_SUB_0_ACTOR_012.Text: *: I once heard tell of a cave among the mountains that would lead to the lands of the East.
*: Indeed, we even tried to go there.
*:  We had hope that we might be able to set up another theatre in those lands.
*: But all that we found was a dead end, and a miserable and most unhelpful dwarf named Nordy...
*: There are perhaps many who think that the enjoyment of the dance is to be found in the abundant flesh on display.
*: But we dancers take great pride in our craft, and practise most intensely every single day.

Txt_Talk_Ashalam_Theater_SUB_0_ACTOR_021.Text: Come, girls! We must try our hardest! No complaining now<--->practice makes perfect, after all!

Txt_Talk_Ashalam_Theater_SUB_0_ACTOR_041.Text: *: Ach! I am such a clumsy fool! Why can I not get the steps right?

Txt_Talk_Ashalam_Theater_SUB_0_ACTOR_061.Text: *: Hm? Do you have business with the manager? Then you must return at night, friend.

Txt_Talk_Ashalam_Theater_SUB_0_ACTOR_062.Text: *: Welcome to the theatre, honoured guest<IfSolo(,s)>!

Txt_Talk_Ashalam_Theater_SUB_0_ACTOR_102.Text: *: Please do not disturb me. They are just getting to the best part...

Txt_Talk_Ashalam_Theater_SUB_0_ACTOR_122.Text: *: Belly dancing is so much fun to watch!
*: Come, sit down with me, and I'll explain the art, and the ethos, and the moves. Ohh, the moves!

Txt_Talk_Ashalam_Theater_SUB_0_ACTOR_112.Text: *: Oh, Vashti... Vash... My little Vasheroon... Go on, girl! Crikey, she's a blinder! Waheyyy!

Txt_Talk_Ashalam_Theater_SUB_0_ACTOR_072.Text: *: Please, do not come too close. You will disturb the dance.

Txt_Talk_Ashalam_Theater_SUB_0_ACTOR_082.Text: Welcome, friend! I am Vashti, shining star of this humble theatre!

Txt_Talk_Ashalam_Theater_SUB_0_ACTOR_092.Text: *: You wish to dance with us, honoured guest? Very well!

*: And-a-shake, and-a-wiggle, and-a...
Yes, that's right! Move your hips!

Txt_Talk_Ashalam_Theater_SearchObj_Groun.Text:
<6>Warning! Counterfeit dancing girls operate in this area.
Beware of strange requests.<9>

Txt_Talk_Ashalam_Hotel_SUB_0_ACTOR_0220_.Text: *: The baths here are for the use of both men and women. How very...unpleasant!

Txt_Talk_Ashalam_Out_SUB_0_VOLUME_0910_0.Text: {LEADER} calms the monster with a soothing voice and tells it about Monty's monster menagerie...
Hee hee hee! That's a good one!

Txt_Talk_Ashalam_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1010_01.Text: *: Heard of musk, friend? Monsters flock at the merest whiff of its pungent aroma. I use it whenever I want to test myself in battle. Buy some at an item shop and use it once you leave town<--->it'll make you very popular!

Txt_Talk_Ashalam_Hotel_SUB_0_ACTOR_0610_.Text: *: As I was strolling through town the other day, I spotted a curious bag upon the ground. When I went for a closer look, I realised it was no bag, but a monster!
*: I tried to capture the creature, but it scurried away before I could get within reach, giggling all the while.
*: If I had a pouch of musk, perhaps the monster would not be so keen to escape me... It takes a bag to catch a bag, you might say!
